scripts.dev:api: echo 'Configure dev:api script for your project'
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:web & npm run dev:api
scripts.diagnose: tail -n 50 .dev.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No .dev.log found'; echo ''; echo 'Port assignments:'; cat .cursor/ports.json 2>/dev/null || echo 'No ports.json found'; echo ''; echo 'Node version:'; node --version; echo 'NPM version:'; npm --version
scripts.ship: npm test 2>/dev/null || true; npm run build 2>/dev/null || true; git add . && git commit -m 'Ship changes' && git push
